sections.description: Disciple Tools Starter Plugin extends the Disciple Tools system for rapid content addition for training purposes.
sections.installation: (Required) You must have Disciple.Tools Theme installed before using this plugin. Once Disciple.Tools is installed, you can use the normal Plugin system to install the plugin.
sections.changelog: This is the public release version of the plugin.
sections.custom_section: This is a custom section labeled 'Custom Section'.
